Interface AccountInfo

Types for Solana account information, blockhashes, epochs, transactions, and token accounts.

interface AccountInfo {
    data: ParsedAccountData;
    executable: boolean;
    lamports: number;
    owner: string;
    rentEpoch?: number;
    space: number;
}
